abstract.p: University of Connecticut Prof Nechama Tec letter clarifies May 28 article; notes her book, Defiance: The Bielski Partisans, has been optioned for TV film and is in its fourth paperback printing (S)

block.p: As the author of ''Defiance: The Bielski Partisans'' (Oxford University Press, 1993), I would like to offer a clarification to ''Heroes Among Us.'' Contrary to the impression given by the article, ''Defiance'' has been optioned for a television film.

As the author of ''Defiance: The Bielski Partisans'' (Oxford University Press, 1993), I would like to offer a clarification to ''Heroes Among Us.'' Contrary to the impression given by the article, ''Defiance'' has been optioned for a television film.
While ''Defiance'' is based on scholarly research, it is in its fourth printing as a paperback published by the trade division of Oxford University Press.
NECHAMA TEC Professor of Sociology University of Connecticut Stamford, Conn.
